text.title: London Hacks - Living on Â£1 a Day | #5
text.p: [Music]
day five right so for breakfast
I found this Krishna temple food for
life place where they feed people Monday
to Saturday and about three locations so
they've got Kentish Town Duvall Camden
Town and they've got Kings Cross so I'm
gonna check that out and see if I can
get a free meal
[Music]
for lunch now I found this place called
the real junk food project and they've
got the same pay as you can concept
going on so you can just go there get
some food do your shopping and just pay
whatever you can so I'm definitely gonna
check that out
all right so I've just got here and it
closed online it says they're open on to
you're free but here it's a it's 12:30
so I need to lunch I'm just gonna keep
it standard so one of the guys in line
this morning actually told me about
another place where they give out free
food a seventh way so
[Music]
it's basically just providing food for
homeless or hungry people and they do it
on every Wednesday every Friday
yeah there's so much of this around
London is so freakin cool man you like
this video give a thumbs up share
subscribe post tweet I'll see you
tomorrow
[Music]
